original_dialogue.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Acid reflux, Doctor: ?

original_dialogue.patient: Not that I know of, Doctor: ?
original_dialogue.doctor: Oh, do you have any Diarrhea?

original_dialogue.patient: Not that I know of, Doctor: ?
original_dialogue.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Stomach ache?

Yes Doctor, I am feeling that as well, Doctor: ?
original_dialogue.doctor: I believe you are having Esophagitis.

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Acid reflux.
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Do you have any other symptoms?

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: I am experiencing pharynx discomfort sometimes.
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Do you have any other symptoms?
